name: New Genesis
text: Main if your leader is Uta, look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 <FILM> type card other than [New Genesis] and add it to your hand. Return the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, set up to 1 rested DON!! as active.

effect.text: If your leader is Uta, look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 <FILM> type card other than [New Genesis] and add it to your hand. Return the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.
Set up to 1 rested DON!! as active.
